definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Eg:In college all the girls want to go out with jocks, the guys with muscles.
sentences.chinese: 大学女生都喜欢和那些身强体壮的帅气男生玩。

sentences.english: Chao signed with the image of cool tricks Linfair record.
sentences.chinese: 张超以帅气花样的形象签约福茂唱片。

sentences.english: You’re funny, charming, and good-looking in the candle light.
sentences.chinese: 约会的烛光下，帅气的你表现得既幽默又迷人。

sentences.english: I put on my safety helmet and the glove, and sat on my silver-white colored bike.
sentences.chinese: 我带上安全帽和手套，帅气的跨上我的银白色铁马。

sentences.english: Angie Bolen: The party. I want you to look good.
sentences.chinese: 派对啊，让你看上去更帅气点。

sentences.english: Liu Gang looks very handsome in the white clothes.
sentences.chinese: 刘刚穿白色衣服看起来很帅气。

sentences.english: He is also very handsome. We can't forget that.
sentences.chinese: 乐福还非常的帅气，我们可不能忽略这一点。

sentences.english: He was in a green army air corps uniform.Handsome.Angry.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著绿色的空军制服，帅气但愤怒。

sentences.english: He was a nice-looking, friendly young man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个帅气的友好的年轻人。

sentences.english: We can be good friends. I am handsome, you see.
sentences.chinese: 我们会成为很好的朋友，我很帅气，你看。

sentences.english: I’ll own up and admit it - - I think he’s coolest out of this bunch.
sentences.chinese: 我坦白承认这件事，他是他们人群中最帅气的一个。

sentences.english: My brother Mike is a smart, good-looking guy.
sentences.chinese: 我的弟弟麦克是一个聪明帅气的人。

sentences.english: I often meet the handsome big boy.
sentences.chinese: 我经常碰到那个帅气的大个子男孩。

sentences.english: He was in a green army air corps uniform. Handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著绿色的空军制服，帅气但愤怒。

sentences.english: Finally you chose him over me, a handsome young man.
sentences.chinese: 最后你居然选择了他，而不选我这个年轻帅气的。

sentences.english: A Xin is not only handsome, but also talented.
sentences.chinese: 阿信，不但拥有帅气的外表，而且才华横溢。

definition: (of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
